meta.title: Google Prompt Framework TCREI
meta.description: Detailed instructions on the TCREI framework for prompt engineering.

items.text: Topic: Clearly identify the subject area. Example: 'Quantum computing basics.'
Context: Offer background information or relevant details. Example: 'Audience has high-school level physics knowledge.'
Request: State exactly what is to be generated. Example: 'Summarize key principles in bullet points.'
Examples: Provide sample outputs if possible. Example: 'Use examples like superposition and entanglement.'
Instructions: Add style or format rules. Example: 'Keep it under 200 words, use plain language.'
